amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to promote exports.

vote.text: Amendment SA 153 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 153 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Portman. (consideration: CR S2303-2307; text: CR S2304-2305) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to promote exports.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 153 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 153 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Portman.
